bill.summary: 6/10/2009--Introduced. Expresses condolences to the families, friends, and loved ones of the victims of the explosion at the ConAgra Foods plant in Garner, North Carolina. Honors Barbara McLean Spears, Lewis Junior Watson, and Rachel Mae Poston Pulley, who lost their lives in the explosion, and the 40 others who were injured. Commends: (1) the heroic actions of the first responders and emergency services personnel; and (2) the hundreds of volunteers who worked together to respond to this tragedy.
